description: CI/CD automation hooks for GitHub, Vercel, and Supabase projects

hooks.description: Verifies Claude CLI is installed, installs if missing in remote environments.
Installs GitHub CLI and configures repository access for gh commands.
Installs Vercel CLI and syncs environment variables from project to .env.local.
Installs Docker, Supabase CLI, and starts local Supabase development stack.
Installs GitHub Actions workflow files for CI/CD automation.
Waits for CI checks to complete after PR creation. Watches GitHub PR checks and reports results, blocking on failure.
